mapper.insert: insert into look (look_id, lesson_id, look_createtime, student_id) values (#{lookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lessonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lookCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select look_id, lesson_id, look_createtime, student_id from look limit #{pageNumber}, #{pageSize}
